thread.title: Kindly advise a convenient local train to Chennai International airport
thread.title_full: Kindly advise a convenient local train to Chennai International airport

author: ramakant1
title: Kindly advise a convenient local train to Chennai International airport
text: India Mike » India Travel » Cities in India » Chennai (Madras) » Kindly advise a convenient local train to Chennai International airport Kindly advise a convenient local train to Chennai International airport # 1 Hi! I need to catch an early morning flight from Chennai International airport, ETD 5am on 26th Oct 2015. I am from Bengaluru. If I take Brindavan Express train on 25th October and get down at Perambur station (say 9pm), what is the simplest transport further to the airport? Possible to avail a local train? Kindly advise. Thanks in advance
